product_name: MAELYSGET-TAUT Body Firming and Hydrating Mousse-To-Oil
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMAÃ‹LYS GET-TAUT Body Firming and Hydrating Mousse-To-oil melts on contact, drenching your skin in hydration for a radiant glow. Itâ€™s powered by Glaucine to help tighten the appearance of skin & clinically proven to reduce the look of wrinkles and visibly hydrate the skin.
details: DetailsFeaturesThe super unique texture allows for a transformative and sensorial experience.The formula dispenses as a lightweight mousse and transitions into a quick-absorbing oil during application.Formulated without: Parabens, SLS, and Phthalates.Key IngredientsSacha Inchi Seed Extract: This potent superfood extract targets the look of sagging skin, promoting smoother, more youthful-looking skin.Glaucine: Helps tighten the look of the skin for a more defined, contoured appearance.Research ResultsClinically proven to reduce the look of wrinkles.Clinically proven to help visibly hydrate the skin.*Based on a 56-day clinical trial with 32 participants.Item 2642894How To UseShake well before use and hold the bottle upright. Apply liberally all over the body.IngredientsWater (Aqua, Eau), Isopropyl Myristate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Propane, Butane, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Extract, Glaucine, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Passiflora Incarnata Seed Oil, Biotin, Tocopherol, Coco-Glucoside, Squalane, Isobutane, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Lauryl Glucoside, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 60, PEG-90M, Sodium Citrate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Alcohol, Sorbic Acid, Silica, Citric Acid, BHT, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Acetyl Cedrene, Coumarin, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Linalyl Acetate, Linalool, Limonene, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well before use and hold the bottle upright. Apply liberally all over the body.

reviews.headline: this product is amazing
reviews.comments: it makes my skin so soft and does appear firmer. I will definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: love this mousse-to-oil by Maelys!
reviews.comments: love this mousse-to-oil by Maelys! A little goes a long way,  it is fun to use and smells delicious! The scent is gorgeous and lasts for a long time. Feels very moisturizing and pleasant on skin, leaves a healthy glow without stickiness. This will definitely be a repurchase for meðŸ¤©ðŸ¤©

reviews.headline: Amazing!!!
reviews.comments: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! Super easy to use ans not greasy! Great fragrance and lasts a long time! Definitely worth the money!

reviews.headline: Luxurious
reviews.comments: Amazing like every other Maelys products I have purchased. feels sexy and seductively smooth on your skin, hydrates and makes you fell silky smooth. Maelys has not let me down yet so I expect great results from the Get -Taut Body Firming and Hydrating Mousse to Oil. I am really happy Ulta carries this line and I can go buy without having to wait for shipping.
